comments:
Description: Error message pops up when selecting value in group 
filter "value".

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a table and bind it to a data set, edit it.
2. Add a group and edit a group filter, Expression as "Total.sum
(row.curr_val,null,1)", operater as "larger than", then select a value.
3. Error message pops up.

org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.core.DataException: Invalid Javascript 
expression: Total.sum(row.curr_val,null,1)
Invalid Javascript expression: Total.sum(row.curr_val,null,1)
Invalid group level: SUM

Now only the text format like row["name"] can use the selectvalue dialog. If there are something wrong, the error message will be shown.
